sspm 0.3.0
  • Reference

Discretize a sspm model object

Source: R/spm_discretize.R
spm_discretize.Rd

Discretize a sspm model object with a function from a discretization_method object class.

spm_discretize(sspm_object, with_dataset, discretization_method, ...)

# S4 method for ANY,ANY,missingOrNULL
spm_discretize(sspm_object, with_dataset, discretization_method, ...)

# S4 method for ANY,missing,ANY
spm_discretize(sspm_object, with_dataset, discretization_method, ...)

# S4 method for sspm,character,discretization_method
spm_discretize(sspm_object, with_dataset, discretization_method, ...)

# S4 method for sspm,character,character
spm_discretize(sspm_object, with_dataset, discretization_method, ...)

# S4 method for sspm_discrete,character,character
spm_discretize(sspm_object, with_dataset, discretization_method, ...)

# S4 method for sspm_discrete,ANY,ANY
spm_discretize(sspm_object, with_dataset, discretization_method, ...)

Arguments

sspm_object

[sspm] An object of class sspm.
with_dataset

[character] The name of the dataset to use for the discretization.
discretization_method

[character OR discretization_method] Either a character from the list of available methods (see spm_methods for the list) OR an object of class discretization_method.
...

[named list] Further arguments to be passed onto the function used in the discretization_method.

Value

An object of class sspm_discrete (the updated and discretized sspm object given as input).

Functions

  • spm_discretize,ANY,ANY,missingOrNULL-method: TODO

  • spm_discretize,ANY,missing,ANY-method: TODO

  • spm_discretize,sspm,character,discretization_method-method: TODO

  • spm_discretize,sspm,character,character-method: TODO

  • spm_discretize,sspm_discrete,character,character-method: TODO

  • spm_discretize,sspm_discrete,ANY,ANY-method: TODO
